duties_responsibilities.duty: Work directly with brides and bridal parties to assist them in finding their ideal gowns
Be an expert on our evening collection to give customers recommendations that best fit their style and preferences
Be active in the overall order fulfillment process to ensure deliveries are on schedule and meet customer expectations
Maintain frequent communication with customers by answering inquiries, accommodating special requests, and giving updates on orders
Provide excellent customer service to each bride to ensure their experience at the salon is personalized and memorable
Assist in the general upkeep and visual presentation of the flagship salon, making sure everything is above standard for our customers
Stay well-informed on industry trends and forecasts to provide helpful insights and recommendations

education_certification.credential: A bachelor’s degree in fashion, retail management, sales or a related field (preferred)
